Posts.Content: May 1, 2010 02:24PM KatieMom wrote: In cognito - my breast MRI showed a cyst on my liver also.  I was completely panicked!  It was and is nothing more than a cyst.  Everyone gets them and they are nothing to worry about.  Mine is quite large - 6cm. and completely harmless.  Try to breathe, relax and keep busy until you have more info.  We are all here for you. Katie
